issue.title: Driving and Propulsion Tutorials reference missing xacro file

content.raw: The Propulsion Tutorial goes on to say that the default configuration is the "H" configuration. Maybe the intended file is #!/osrf/vmrc/src/default/wamv_gazebo/urdf/thruster_layouts/wamv_aft_thrusters.xacro ? This seems to describe two thrusters, but does not contain the cmdTopic tag referenced in the paragraph.
content.html: The Propulsion Tutorial goes on to say that the default configuration is the "H" configuration. Maybe the intended file is #!/osrf/vmrc/src/default/wamv_gazebo/urdf/thruster_layouts/wamv_aft_thrusters.xacro ? This seems to describe two thrusters, but does not contain the cmdTopic tag referenced in the paragraph.
